summary: An unsuspecting, down-and-out man in a washed-up hick town has his life turned upside down when a drop-dead gorgeous stranger walks through the door of the local bar.
cast: Marc Blucas|Naveen Andrews|Nicki Aycox|Eva Amurri Martino|Andy Comeau|Bart Johnson|Gillian Shure|Mark Elias|Ron Roggé|Heidi Shepherd|Adrienne Hartvigsen|Matthew C. Temple|Christopher Tarantino|Charles Halford|Stan Ellsworth|Skip Carlsen|Lorrie Dohoney|Nina Alverez|Ashley Barenz|Monica Campbell|Sofya Sadiq|Michelle Buck|Shalaina Castle|Brandee Burnam|Erin Empey-Baxter|Josh Everett|Raquel Goodsell|Michael McQuain|Alan Meyer|Tisha Vaculin
title: Animals
